phrases: Make sure you listen to your uncle.
Wait, do not tell me that is everything?
I made sure I packed the black ones.
Make sure you do not forget your luggage on the bullet train, okay?
Do not zone out and miss your stop.
I have been going there every year, so I will be all right.
The first time I met him
The Light of a Firefly Forest
I got lost in the forest of the mountain god,
which was said to be where spirits lived.
After running around searching for an exit
I became so tired I could not move.
When I started crying from fear and loneliness,
You are a human child, right?
If a human touches me, I will disappear.
something that lives in this forest.
you are one of the spirits?
what do you mean by disappear?
Y-You are really not human after all...
N-No human would hit a child like that!
To disappear means to be obliterated.
That is the spell that the mountain god placed upon me.
If I get touched by a human,
You are lost, are not you?
I will lead you out of the forest.
Did not I just tell you?
It is just like going on a date!
If you go straight, you will hit the mountain path.
Are you always going to be here?
If I come back here, can we meet again?
This is the forest where the mountain god and spirits live.
Set foot within, and you will lose your way and be lost forever.
That is what the villagers say, right?
Anyway, I will be back tomorrow with a thank-you present!
If you go into the forest on your own and get hurt,
what are you going to do?
Is it true that there are spirits living in that forest?
When I was little, I wanted to meet the spirits,
so my friends and I often went into the forest.
In the end, I never met any,
but I had the feeling I would occasionally spot something
from the corner of my eye.
you could hear the sounds of the river coming from the forest.
And now that I think about it,
Iwa said she and her friends went and had fun
at a summer festival in the forest.
But there is no way the villagers would have held a festival in the forest.
So then, whose festival could it have been?
It started this crazy story that
they must have snuck into a festival for the spirits.
We were so stupid back when we were kids.
This is the forest where the mountain god and spirits live.
Set foot within, and you will lose your way and be lost forever.
I did not think you would really come back.
You just do not learn, do you?
I was so happy, I just...
It is a bit hot here.
I will see you out of here again.
Please do not touch Gin's skin.
If you do, I will eat you!
He is another one of the spirits.
He transforms to scare people, but he is all bark and no bite.
This is the first time I have seen a real spirit!
So what did you think I was?
So what did you think I was?
So what did you think I was?
So what did you think I was?
So what did you think I was?
Gin, are you a No-Face or something?
Why do you wear a mask?
That is why I waited for you.
The next day and the day after that, I went back to the forest.
Those summer days, I ran and played all around the mountain.
It is fine if I touch his mask, right?
Attacking someone while they are asleep...
You sure are a scary little lady.
you were pretending to sleep, were not you?
I looked normal, did not I?
Why are you wearing that mask?
If I do not wear this mask,
I do not look like a spirit, do I?
I told you about it before, right?
That I am just staying at my uncle's place for the summer?
So I have to go home tomorrow.
Will you be able to come again next year?
became something I looked forward to.
Gin waited for our promised summer.
Of course the water is cold.
If she touches you, you will disappear.
Please do not touch him, human child.
The spirits can touch him, right?
I wanted to see your startled face, but...
At least when I am around,
can you take off your mask every once in a while?
No matter what, do not ever touch me, okay?
The next summer and the summer after that
I am here again this year.
I have become a fifth grader.
you are starting to look like a woman.
Even though I am in middle school now,
a lot of my elementary school friends are in the same classes,
so it does not really feel like anything changed.
Our ages are gradually getting closer.
Gin ages much more slowly than humans.
When I start running, let go, okay?
As the years go by, my appearance changes,
but Gin is almost the same as the day we met.
Someday I will be older than Gin, will not I?
They went to buy gifts for friends in Yokohama.
What time are you taking the bullet train tomorrow?
but they said I will still be here until the afternoon.
This summer's weather was good, so the watermelons are sweet.
If it continues like this, then winter will be freezing.
Since this area's located between mountains and the ocean's far away,
the temperature difference between summer and winter is huge.
The cold of a winter that follows an especially hot summer
could probably freeze the mountain god himself.
Please use it in the winter, okay?
Should not you be heading to your next class soon?
Ah, you probably ate before dinner, did not you?
If you snack, you will gain weight.
I am going to take a bath!
Have not you been a little out of it lately?
Actually, you have always been that way, but...
Time really flies, does not it?
You are already in high school, huh.
You do not come running at me anymore these days.
I learned my lesson after all those beatings.
I am looking forward to it.
In three years, when I graduate, I plan on looking for a job here.
Then I can be with you more.
Let me tell you about myself.
It seems like I was once a human,
but when I was a baby,
I was abandoned in this forest.
I would only just been abandoned, so I cried helplessly
as if to call back the parents who left me.
They say I did not stop crying for a long time.
but the mountain god appeared and cast a spell that allowed me to continue living.
So that I never move on.
It is okay if you forget about me.
A body that is maintained by magic is very weak.
If it touches a real human body,
the spell will break and the body will disappear.
It is such a fragile thing.
It is just like snow, is not it?
I thought of you during winter.
Time might separate us some day.
No, a summer festival held by the spirits.
There is not much of a difference.
I thought you might get scared, so I did not invite you.
can you sneak out of your house?
I have wanted to go with you for a long time.
Meet me at eight at our usual place.
But a festival filled with spirits sounds a little unnerving...
On top of that, it is at night.
On the outside, it is not very different from a human festival.
It is supposed to mimic human festivals, after all.
And I will protect you, Hotaru.
When you say things that, it makes me want to glomp you.
It is just like a human festival.
Are they all disguised as humans?
I have heard that sometimes even humans unknowingly mix in.
Like Iwa and her friends, huh?
It is just like going on a date!
Everyone went all out with their disguises, did not they?
It was like a mimicking competition!
Is it like this every year?
Yeah, every time summer comes around...
I can no longer wait for summer to come around.
When I am away from you, even though I cannot be around crowds, I want to go see you.
He probably will not come to that place next summer.
This is the mountain god's forest.
We wanted to be with Gin forever, but...
Gin wanted to touch a human.
He finally got to be hugged by a human.
I probably will not be able to
look forward to summer for a long time.
But this warmth in my hands and
these summer memories will live on in my heart.
J The cicadas laugh out in song J
J to the red evening sunset J
J The way back home is long J
J but I promised to come here again tomorrow J
J The summer is in full bloom J
J making you look more beautiful than ever J
J I thought the tale would never end J
J but I realize now that something comes after J
J The crows too took flight J
J and went somewhere far, far away J
J The summer flies by J
J to hide away its treasures till next year J
J I will never ever forget J
J those golden summer days J
J That summer which brought joy J
J to my boring everyday life J
J to help me keep my promise of that day J
J The summer is still in bloom J
J making you look more beautiful than ever J
